pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implementation of Cluster-Polarization Coefficient // Implements cluster-polarization coefficient for measuring distributional polarization in single or multiple dimensions, as well as associated functions. Contains support for hierarchical clustering, k-means, partitioning around medoids, density-based spatial clustering with noise, and manually imposed cluster membership. Mehlhaff (forthcoming) https://imehlhaff.net/files/CPC_note.pdf.
